name: Sensing
description:
This 54-second film is the fourth in my Physical Math series of Vectrex oscillographic animations. Entitled Sensing, it's one of the most evocative of the series, possessing an almost graphic quality that belies its electronic machine-origins. Using sound from an A-100 analog synthesizer, I created these images on a modified 1980s Vectrex game console, captured it in 4k and rendered it here at 12.5 frames per second.

1/1

2160x2160
